title: IInvenTiv Mega R&D Fair
description: Two projects were selected from NIT, out of which one was from RIG. This project was presented in front of the Hon'ble education minister of India.

title: Professors visit from Oxford Brookes University
description: We had the opportunity to be visited by esteemed professors from the Oxford Brookes University, United Kingdom.

title: KTX Expo
description: Showcased AVIBOT, one of RIG's flagship projects, at the KTX Global, aiming to attract industry partnerships to make the product market-ready.

title: Disha Expo
description: Represented NIT Calicut at Disha Expo'23, showcasing a few RIG projects to higher secondary school students. A technical stall was also put up at Disha 2018 organized by the Government of Kerala.

title: Malabar Innovation Fest
description: Exhibited RIG projects at the Malabar Innovation Fest held at the Regional Science Centre Calicut, organized by the Government of Kerala.

title: Exhibition at KMCT College of Engineering for Women
description: Displayed robotic projects at KMCT College of Engineering for Women, highlighting RIG's innovations.

title: Kerala Startup Mission Startup Yatra
description: Participated in the Kerala Startup Mission's Startup Yatra held at Thiruvananthapuram, showcasing RIG projects.

title: Exhibition at Govt Polytechnic College Kasaragode
description: Exhibited RIG projects at the Government Polytechnic College in Kasaragode, engaging with students and faculty.

title: Stall at Ente Keralam Exhibition Kozhikode
description: We had the honour to put up a stall in the exhibition conducted by Ente Keralam exhibition at Calicut beach

title: Exhibition at Vidya Academy of Science and Technology
description: Exhibited robotic projects at Vidya Academy of Science and Technology, engaging with students and faculty.

title: Prof Maruthi Ram Akella Visit
description: Demonstrated all RIG Project to Prof Maruthi Ram Akella an alumnus of NIT Calicut, who is currently Aerospace Engg Professor at University of Texas at Austin.

title: Lab Visits
description: Held several lab visits for school students, showcasing robotic technologies and ongoing projects in RIG.
